Bash("D:\\MyProject\\AccHelper\\venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import urllib.request, json, http.cookiejar
cj = http.cookiejar.MozillaCookieJar\(''cookies.txt''\)
cj.load\(\)
opener = urllib.request.build_opener\(urllib.request.HTTPCookieProcessor\(cj\)\)

# Test stats
resp = opener.open\(''http://localhost:8001/api/stats''\)
print\(''Stats:'', resp.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)

# Test QA list
resp = opener.open\(''http://localhost:8001/api/qa?page=1&size=5''\)
data = json.loads\(resp.read\(\).decode\(''utf-8''\)\)
print\(''QA total:'', data[''total''], ''pages:'', data[''pages'']\)
print\(''First QA id:'', data[''items''][0][''qa_id''] if data[''items''] else ''none''\)
")
